entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support navigating with URLs for HybridWebView #24821
  • [META] Xcode 16.0 Support for .NET 8/9 and MAUI #24819
  • Updating a Border.TranslationY does not work in Android #24818
    Backlog
  • missing test for x:ClassModifier #24814
    .NET 9 Planning
  • I cannot select API Level 35 for Android. #24813
  • WebViewHandler OnProgressChanged not called on Android when loading/navigating WebView #24812
    Backlog

Closed

  • [iOS] Custom Debug Configuration Issue & Crash #20211
  • Unable to validate .IPA file because of AppIcon missed #24796
  • Cannot build .NET Maui app from vs code on mac following macOS 15.0 update #24816
  • +[IMKClient subclass]: chose IMKClient_Legacy +[IMKInputSession subclass]: chose IMKInputSession_Legacy macOS 15.0 #24794
  • Can't "Pair to Mac" > Problem with Xamarin Website? #24809
  • Add FontScale property to IFontElement #24800

PullRequests

Created

  • Measure invalidation performance and fixes (batching version) #24823
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 (take 3) #24822
  • [housekeeping] Update & Consolidate Appium + driver versions #24817
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Adds a rendering performance test #24762
    area-layout, area-testing, community ✨
  • Measure invalidation performance and fixes #24532
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • Fix DataTrigger behavior that can cause some strange inconsistencies #15655
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • Fixed NavigationPage Title property #24781
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Editor control does not scroll properly on iOS when enclosed in a Border control. #24683
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • Fix Provided consistent behavior of text color in tabbed page in all platforms. #24782
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [X] allow namescope resolution before parenting #22854
    area-xaml
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Android] Fix for Scrolling of Editor placed in ScollView issue #24531
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fix Frame offsets inner content view by 1pt #24582
    community ✨, area-controls-frame, s/pr-needs-author-input
